tasks.label: Upload & Run on ESP32
args: "C:/Users/Jonathan/AppData/Local/Packages/PythonSoftwareFoundation.Python.3.11_qbz5n2kfra8p0/LocalCache/local-packages/Python311/Scripts/mpremote.exe" connect COM3 fs cp "${file}" :main.py && "C:/Users/Jonathan/AppData/Local/Packages/PythonSoftwareFoundation.Python.3.11_qbz5n2kfra8p0/LocalCache/local-packages/Python311/Scripts/mpremote.exe" connect COM3 reset && "C:/Users/Jonathan/AppData/Local/Packages/PythonSoftwareFoundation.Python.3.11_qbz5n2kfra8p0/LocalCache/local-packages/Python311/Scripts/mpremote.exe" connect COM3 repl
